description:
Designed to feel better than sleeping in your birthday suit, Snooze is made with a buttery-soft modal. These PJs feature Flat Out Seam for chafe-free comfort. The official uniform of relaxation nation, it's the perfect pant for hanging out at home in or when you want to enhance your R&R. 

**Does not include the BallPark Pouch
name: Saxx Underwear Snooze Pants, 29" Inseam - Mens
